Package quoridor

Interface Summary
Move Move interface for wall and player movements
 

Class Summary
AbstractMove Template class of Move Controls all movement here.
AIPlayer AI player class has MinMax algorithm and handles AI movement
AITest JUnit Test case for AI.
AllMoves Handles wall and player movements
AStarNode Node with G & F costs and parentPosition for A* Pathfinding
AStarPathfinding A* Pathfinding gets shortest path in either number of moves or moves.
Board Board class where both players and walls are stored.
Display Display board in ASCII
Game Create different type of games such as Human-Human, Computer-Computer, Human-Computer and no display game for testing
Globals Has the max row and max column of the board
PlayerMove Generate and Validate player moves
PlayerTile Player tile consists of player number, wall count of player and goal row of player
ProvidedTests JUnit Test Case to test for different rules of Quoridor.
Quoridor To run Quoridor
Tile Tile of board consists of column and row.
Validator Validator class provided by LIC to test a given list of moves
WallMove Generate and Validate wall moves
WallTile Wall tile consists of top and right wall flags
